about_the_game:
Jump into this fast paced 3 v. 3 Sports Shooter, where goals meet gunfire.

Choose your class, get onto the field, shoot to kill, and score to win. Compete as powerful strikers to get the ball into the opponent’s goal, at all costs. Through a mix of tactical shooting, sports strategy, and finesse - dominate the league!

COMPETE IN THE ULTIMATE SPORTS ARENA: Tackle opponents, pass the ball to teammates, block incoming shots, and eliminate anyone standing between you and the goal to score and win. As a team, you’ll shoot, score, and strategize your way to victory.



SELECT YOUR STRIKER: Choose from a stacked roster of 10+ strikers, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. Whether you prefer the speed of light strikers, the disruption of medium strikers, or the power of heavy strikers - find your niche and own the field.



UNLEASH YOUR INNER BEAST: Suit up with a huge arsenal of weapons and abilities. From rocket launchers and assault rifles to hydro cannons and teleport grenades, there’s a full range of offensive, defensive, and strategic skills and weaponry to master.



TRAVEL THE GLOBE: From New York to Tokyo, compete at iconic locations across the world. Each arena offers varying routes and cover to learn and capitalize on.



SPEED KILLS: Experience adrenaline-pumping gameplay where speed is your greatest weapon. Dash across the arena, charge your shot, and outplay opponents to beat the buzzer.



SHAPE THE GAME: Help influence the evolution of the game, as we make updates and improvements based on community feedback.

Ready to cause chaos this season? Wishlist now, and join us in the arena!
detailed_description:
Join The Discord


About the Game

Jump into this fast paced 3 v. 3 Sports Shooter, where goals meet gunfire.

Choose your class, get onto the field, shoot to kill, and score to win. Compete as powerful strikers to get the ball into the opponent’s goal, at all costs. Through a mix of tactical shooting, sports strategy, and finesse - dominate the league!

COMPETE IN THE ULTIMATE SPORTS ARENA: Tackle opponents, pass the ball to teammates, block incoming shots, and eliminate anyone standing between you and the goal to score and win. As a team, you’ll shoot, score, and strategize your way to victory.



SELECT YOUR STRIKER: Choose from a stacked roster of 10+ strikers, each with their own unique abilities and playstyles. Whether you prefer the speed of light strikers, the disruption of medium strikers, or the power of heavy strikers - find your niche and own the field.



UNLEASH YOUR INNER BEAST: Suit up with a huge arsenal of weapons and abilities. From rocket launchers and assault rifles to hydro cannons and teleport grenades, there’s a full range of offensive, defensive, and strategic skills and weaponry to master.



TRAVEL THE GLOBE: From New York to Tokyo, compete at iconic locations across the world. Each arena offers varying routes and cover to learn and capitalize on.



SPEED KILLS: Experience adrenaline-pumping gameplay where speed is your greatest weapon. Dash across the arena, charge your shot, and outplay opponents to beat the buzzer.



SHAPE THE GAME: Help influence the evolution of the game, as we make updates and improvements based on community feedback.

Ready to cause chaos this season? Wishlist now, and join us in the arena!
name: Ultra Strikers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-4690 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti or Radeon RX 460
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-11700 or AMD Ryzen 5 5600
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2080 or Radeon RX6700
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Jump into this fast paced 3 v. 3 Sports Shooter, where goals meet gunfire. Race for the ball, shoot your opponents, and score goals to win. Compete as powerful strikers to dominate the league. Join us in the arena now!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
